cards.title: Bombshell
body: At the start of the environment turn, {Bombshell} deals each non-conspirator target 2 fire damage.
cards.flavorText: Carnaval smirked. “Time for fireworks{BR}already?” The woman laughed. “Perhaps if you{BR}play your cards right, Mr. Rooke. Or if you{BR}play them wrong. Stanek wants to see you.”

flavorQuotes.text: Time for fireworks{BR}already?
Perhaps if you{BR}play your cards right, Mr. Rooke. Or if you{BR}play them wrong. Stanek wants to see you.

cards.title: Dining with a Devil
body: Increase damage dealt to non-environment targets by 1.
Increase HP recovery by 2.
At the start of the environment turn, play the top card of the environment deck and destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Stanek glanced at Carnaval. “I'm glad you{BR}could join me, Mr. Rooke. I apologize for the{BR}incident last time. Things would have gone{BR}quite differently had I competent help at the time.”

flavorQuotes.text: I'm glad you{BR}could join me, Mr. Rooke. I apologize for the{BR}incident last time.
Things would have gone quite differently had I{BR}had competent help at the time.

cards.title: Dr. Wendigo
body: When {DrWendigo} deals damage, add a token to this card.
At the end of the environment turn, {DrWendigo} deals the target other than himself with the second highest HP X melee damage, where X = 2 plus the number of tokens on this card.
cards.flavorText: Stanek smiled faintly. “Mr. Rooke, I don't{BR}believe I've introduced you to Doctor{BR}Wendigo. He is quite the scientist. A{BR}veritable miracle-worker.”

flavorQuotes.text: Mr. Rooke, I don't{BR}believe I've introduced you to Doctor{BR}Wendigo. He is quite the scientist. A{BR}veritable miracle-worker.

cards.title: Gisela Caro
body: This card is a hero card.
When this card is destroyed, remove it from the game.
Increase damage dealt to this card by 1 for each token on this card.
At the end of the environment turn, you may reveal the top card of a deck. Discard or replace it. Then add a token to this card.
cards.flavorText: Peacekeeper grinned. “Don't worry, she's{BR}not your type anyway. Too sane.”

flavorQuotes.text: Don't worry, she's{BR}not your type anyway. Too sane.

cards.title: Grand Hotel Roof
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Areas.
Increase damage dealt by 1.
At the start of the environment turn, each player may discard a card to destroy this card.
At the end of the environment turn, 1 player discards a card.
cards.flavorText: Peacekeeper checked his weapon and{BR}muttered to himself. “Great. Just great.{BR}Open sightlines, little cover, high{BR}visibility.”

flavorQuotes.text: “Great. Just great.{BR}Open sightlines, little cover, high{BR}visibility.

cards.title: Last Call
body: When this card is destroyed, destroy all environment cards, then deal each target X fire damage and X projectile damage, where X = 1 plus the number of cards destroyed this way.
When this card has no tokens on it, destroy it.
When this card enters play, put 3 tokens on it.
At the end of the environment turn, remove a token from this card.
cards.flavorText: Carnaval fiddled with his earpiece.{BR}“Beneath the craps table? No, I didn't put{BR}a bomb [b]there[/b].” He paused. “Out of{BR}curiosity, why do you ask?”

flavorQuotes.text: Beneath the craps table? No, I didn't put{BR}a bomb [b]there[/b].
Out of{BR}curiosity, why do you ask?

cards.title: Mercenary Squad
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by 1.
At the start of the environment turn, this card deals the non-Conspirator target with the second highest HP X projectile damage, where X = the current HP of this card.
cards.flavorText: Push frowned. “Do you think she'll be{BR}alright?” Node's disembodied voice filled{BR}her mind. <She is... having fun.>

flavorQuotes.text: Do you think she'll be{BR}alright?
She is... having fun.

cards.title: No, Mr. Rooke, I Expect You to Die
body: At the start of the environment turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP {H + 2} irreducible energy damage.
Then destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Burgess struggled to disengage the{BR}restraints. “I don't want to rush you, but if{BR}you take much longer, I'll need two seats{BR}for the flight home,” Carnaval said dryly.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't want to rush you, but if{BR}you take much longer, I'll need two seats{BR}for the flight home,

cards.title: Secret Lair
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Area cards.
Increase damage dealt to conspirators by 1.
At the start of the environment turn, each conspirator deals the non-conspirator target with the second highest HP 2 projectile damage each.
cards.flavorText: Carnaval pressed on. “Ah, so he didn't tell{BR}you the whole building would blow this time?{BR}Guess you're meant to stay behind with us.”{BR}Bombshell shook her head. “You're lying.”

flavorQuotes.text: Ah, so he didn't tell{BR}you the whole building would blow this time?{BR}Guess you're meant to stay behind with us.
You're lying.

cards.title: Sinister Laboratory
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Areas.
Increase toxic and psychic damage dealt by 1.
At the end of the environment turn, play the top card of the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: Peacekeeper discreetly activated his{BR}earpiece. “Listen, next time we do this,{BR}you get the creepy scientist. I had{BR}enough of that in the military.”

flavorQuotes.text: Listen, next time we do this,{BR}you get the creepy scientist. I had{BR}enough of that in the military.

cards.title: Spirits Near and Far
body: At the end of the environment turn, you may move this card next to a hero. That hero gains the following power:
powers: Put a card from your trash into your hand. Destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “We've all lost someone,” Janson{BR}muttered. “Now you've roped Varano into{BR}this. I'll say this once: if he doesn't come{BR}back, you don't either.”

flavorQuotes.text: We've all lost someone,
Now you've roped Varano into{BR}this. I'll say this once: if he doesn't come{BR}back, you don't either.

cards.title: Stanek's Goons
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the 2 non-conspirator targets with the lowest HP X projectile damage each, where X is the number of conspirators in play.
cards.flavorText: One of the men shrugged as he attached{BR}a suppressor. “Nothing personal... but{BR}the boss... he doesn't like witnesses.”

flavorQuotes.text: Nothing personal... but{BR}the boss... he doesn't like witnesses.

cards.title: Test Subjects
body: This card is a hero card.
When this card is reduced to 0 or fewer HP, each hero deals themself 1 psychic damage.
At the end of the environment turn, {DrWendigo} regains 2 HP, then deals this card 2 toxic damage.
At the start of the environment turn, 1 player may draw a card.
cards.flavorText: Dr. Wendigo rounded on{BR}Peacekeeper suddenly. “What would you{BR}know?!” he shrieked. “Science demands{BR}sacrifice! These undesirables pave the way for{BR}future greatness!”

flavorQuotes.text: What would you{BR}know?!
Science demands{BR}sacrifice! These undesirables pave the way for{BR}future greatness!

cards.title: The Golden Dawn Casino
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Area cards.
At the end of the environment turn, 1 player chooses a number between 1 and 4, selects a keyword, and discards the top card of their deck.
If that card has the selected keyword, they draw that many cards, otherwise their hero deals themself that much psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: “I think we can help. I'm Grandfather. This is my{BR}girl Friday.” The woman smiled and offered her{BR}hand to Arctis. “Pleased to meet you,” she said{BR}warmly. Arctis only scowled.

flavorQuotes.text: I think we can help. I'm Grandfather. This is my{BR}girl Friday.
Pleased to meet you,

cards.title: Tight Hallways
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Area cards.
Increase projectile damage dealt by 1.
Reduce non-projectile damage dealt by 1.
At the end of the environment turn, each player discards a card and draws a card.
cards.flavorText: “No more!” Push shouted. Her voice shook the{BR}walls and floor, then it impacted Roiya's{BR}forces, knocking them end over end as every{BR}piece of glass within hundreds of feet shattered.

flavorQuotes.text: No more!
